original_text:
But they laughed at him.
After he put them all out, he took the child’s father and mother and the disciples who were with him, and went in where the child was.
korean_text: 그들이 비웃더라 예수께서 그들을 다 내보내신 후에 아이의 부모와 또 자기와 함께 한 자들을 데리시고 아이 있는 곳에 들어가사

sentences.original_text: After he put them all out,
he took the child's father and mother
and the disciples who were with him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그와 함께 있던 제자들을 데리고

sentences.original_text: and went in where the child was.
